segments.text: I am exhausted . I need some sleep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Didn ’ t you sleep well last night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I twisted and turned all night , and couldn ’ t sleep . I was worried about my mother ’ s health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . It ’ s only a cold .
segments.speaker: S2
